templates.name: GitHub Push
templates.description: GitHub push event triggered when commits are pushed to a repository branch or tag

templates.name: GitHub Pull Request
templates.description: GitHub pull request event triggered when a PR is opened, closed, reopened, edited, assigned, labeled, synchronized, etc.

templates.name: GitHub Issues
templates.description: GitHub issues event triggered when an issue is opened, edited, deleted, pinned, closed, reopened, assigned, labeled, etc.

templates.name: GitHub Installation
templates.description: GitHub App installation event triggered when the app is installed, uninstalled, suspended, or has permissions changed

templates.name: GitHub Installation Repositories
templates.description: GitHub App installation repositories event triggered when repositories are added to or removed from an installation
